title: Number of Pokémon GO daily users in the U.S. 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 4 number of Months.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
There is a difference of 24.0 between the maximum Month July 19 and minimum Month July 12.
